description: Joe Crowe scores an injury-time winner as Carrick Rangers defeat Larne 1-0 in the east Antrim derby at Taylors Avenue.
title: Watch: Crowe scores injury-time winner against Larne
title_page: Watch: Crowe scores injury-time winner against Larne - BBC Sport
maintext:
FULL-TIME
Glentoran 1-0 Ballymena United
Despite Ballymena coming very close at the end Glentoran secure the three points thanks to a Nathaniel Ferris goal.
Results elsewhere mean that Glenavon leapfrog Ballymena, who are now tenth.
CLOSE!
Glentoran 1-0 Ballymena United
What a chance for Ballymena right at the death!
James Hood does well to keep possession when under pressure from Fuad Sule and whips it into the box with Stephen O'Donnell's header somehow stopped by Daniel Gyollai.
FULL-TIME
Loughgall 0-2 Glenavon
All over at Lakeview Park where Glenavon's revival under Paddy McLaughlin continues with a comfortable 2-0 win at Loughgall.
Christopher Atherton opened the scoring for the visitors with his first league goal of the campaign after 18 minutes.
And midfielder Jack Malone popped up unmarked in the Loughgall penalty area to head home his team's second from a pin point Peter Campbell cross.
The Lurgan Blues had chances to extend their lead against a Loughgall side who created little, bar an early header from Jordan Gibson.
Post
Glentoran 1-0 Ballymena United
It has started to absolutely chuck it down at the Oval as we approach the full-time whistle.
Ballymena are still pushing forward, but time is really running out.
GOAL - Carrick 1-0 Larne
Joe Crowe - 90+3mins
Would you believe it, Carrick have stolen it at the death!
After sustained pressure in and around the Larne box, Kyle Cherry fires in a low free-kick from the right that is back-heeled into the Larne goal by Crowe.
